db:abstract.db:para: The QPrintPreviewWidget class provides a widget for previewing page layouts for printer output.

db:listitem.db:para: QPrintPreviewWidget is part of Printer and Printing APIs

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QPrintPreviewDialog uses a QPrintPreviewWidget internally, and the purpose of QPrintPreviewWidget is to make it possible to embed the preview into other widgets. It also makes it possible to build a different user interface around it than the default one provided with QPrintPreviewDialog.
Using QPrintPreviewWidget is straightforward:

db:listitem.db:para: Construct the QPrintPreviewWidget either by passing in an existing QPrinter object, or have QPrintPreviewWidget create a default constructed QPrinter object for you.
Connect the paintRequested() signal to a slot.

When the widget needs to generate a set of preview pages, a paintRequested() signal will be emitted from the widget. Connect a slot to this signal, and draw onto the QPrinter passed in as a signal parameter. Call QPrinter::newPage(), to start a new page in the preview.

db:section.db:title: enum QPrintPreviewWidget::ViewMode
db:section.db:para: This enum is used to describe the view mode of the preview widget.

db:td.db:para: A mode where single pages in the preview is viewed.
A mode where the facing pages in the preview is viewed.
A view mode where all the pages in the preview is viewed.

db:section.db:title: enum QPrintPreviewWidget::ZoomMode
db:section.db:para: This enum is used to describe zoom mode of the preview widget.

db:td.db:para: The zoom is set to a custom zoom value.
This mode fits the current page to the width of the view.
This mode fits the current page inside the view.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QPrintPreviewWidget::QPrintPreviewWidget(QPrinter *printer, QWidget *parent = nullptr, Qt::WindowFlags flags = Qt::WindowFlags())
db:section.db:para: Constructs a QPrintPreviewWidget based on printer and with parent as the parent widget. The widget flags flags are passed on to the QWidget constructor.

db:section.db:title: [explicit] QPrintPreviewWidget::QPrintPreviewWidget(QWidget *parent = nullptr, Qt::WindowFlags flags = Qt::WindowFlags())
db:section.db:para: This is an overloaded function.
This will cause QPrintPreviewWidget to create an internal, default constructed QPrinter object, which will be used to generate the preview.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QPrintPreviewWidget::~QPrintPreviewWidget()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the QPrintPreviewWidget.

db:section.db:title: int QPrintPreviewWidget::currentPage() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the currently viewed page in the preview.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::fitInView()
db:section.db:para: This is a convenience function and is the same as calling setZoomMode(QPrintPreviewWidget::FitInView).

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::fitToWidth()
db:section.db:para: This is a convenience function and is the same as calling setZoomMode(QPrintPreviewWidget::FitToWidth).

db:section.db:title: QPageLayout::Orientation QPrintPreviewWidget::orientation() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current orientation of the preview. This value is obtained from the QPrinter object associated with the preview.

db:section.db:title: int QPrintPreviewWidget::pageCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of pages in the preview.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::paintRequested(QPrinter *printer)
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the preview widget needs to generate a set of preview pages. printer is the printer associated with this preview widget.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::previewChanged()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted whenever the preview widget has changed some internal state, such as the orientation.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::print()
db:section.db:para: Prints the preview to the printer associated with the preview.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::setAllPagesViewMode()
db:section.db:para: This is a convenience function and is the same as calling setViewMode(QPrintPreviewWidget::AllPagesView).

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::setCurrentPage(int page)
db:section.db:para: Sets the current page in the preview. This will cause the view to skip to the beginning of page.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::setFacingPagesViewMode()
db:section.db:para: This is a convenience function and is the same as calling setViewMode(QPrintPreviewWidget::FacingPagesView).

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::setLandscapeOrientation()
db:section.db:para: This is a convenience function and is the same as calling setOrientation(QPageLayout::Landscape).

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::setOrientation(QPageLayout::Orientation orientation)
db:section.db:para: Sets the current orientation to orientation. This value will be set on the QPrinter object associated with the preview.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::setPortraitOrientation()
db:section.db:para: This is a convenience function and is the same as calling setOrientation(QPageLayout::Portrait).

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::setSinglePageViewMode()
db:section.db:para: This is a convenience function and is the same as calling setViewMode(QPrintPreviewWidget::SinglePageView).

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::setViewMode(QPrintPreviewWidget::ViewMode mode)
db:section.db:para: Sets the view mode to mode. The default view mode is SinglePageView.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::setZoomFactor(qreal factor)
db:section.db:para: Sets the zoom factor of the view to factor. For example, a value of 1.0 indicates an unscaled view, which is approximately the size the view will have on paper. A value of 0.5 will halve the size of the view, while a value of 2.0 will double the size of the view.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::setZoomMode(QPrintPreviewWidget::ZoomMode zoomMode)
db:section.db:para: Sets the zoom mode to zoomMode. The default zoom mode is FitInView.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::updatePreview()
db:section.db:para: This function updates the preview, which causes the paintRequested() signal to be emitted.

db:section.db:title: QPrintPreviewWidget::ViewMode QPrintPreviewWidget::viewMode() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current view mode. The default view mode is SinglePageView.

db:section.db:title: qreal QPrintPreviewWidget::zoomFactor() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the zoom factor of the view.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::zoomIn(qreal factor = 1.1)
db:section.db:para: Zooms the current view in by factor. The default value for factor is 1.1, which means the view will be scaled up by 10%.

db:section.db:title: QPrintPreviewWidget::ZoomMode QPrintPreviewWidget::zoomMode() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current zoom mode.

db:section.db:title: void QPrintPreviewWidget::zoomOut(qreal factor = 1.1)
db:section.db:para: Zooms the current view out by factor. The default value for factor is 1.1, which means the view will be scaled down by 10%.
